medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Acute abdominal pain began approximately 2 hours prior to admission, associated with nausea but no vomiting. Patient has been diaphoretic since the onset of symptoms, with no fever, chills, diarrhea, or rectal bleeding.
medical_history.past_medical_history: GIST, HTN, GERD, mitral valve prolapse, DU (prior to GIST resection), HL, Colitis
medical_history.family_history: Father with aortic aneurysm, HTN, CAD. Mother with ALS.
